text: Bangarang is the fifth EP by American electronic music producer, Skrillex. Bangarang was released on December 23, 2011. Singles from the EP are "Breakn' a Sweat" which features the American rock band The Doors and "Bangarang" which features American rapper Sirah. The song "Breakn' a Sweat" was written for the 2012 documentary film Re:Generation. The iTunes version of the EP features an "Orchestral Suite" performed by Varien. The EP received generally mixed to positive reviews from music critics. The EP reached #14 on the Billboard 200 as well as #1 on the Top Dance/Electronic Albums chart. ==Songs== == References == ==Other websites== *Bangarang at Discogs Category:2011 albums Category:Skrillex albums
title: Bangarang (EP)
